description: A modern, responsive front-end built using only HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to redesign the JR Tax Preparation homepage and its related interactive features.

tasks.title: Setup Project Structure
tasks.description: Create the project folder structure including index.html, styles.css, scripts.js, and the PRD file (PRD.md).

tasks.title: Implement Homepage Layout
tasks.description: Develop the homepage with a header, navigation, main content (welcome message, business information, service area, countdown timer) and footer as specified in the PRD.

tasks.title: Add Interactive Elements
tasks.description: Implement the Cost Estimator Tool and Countdown Timer using client-side JavaScript. Ensure dynamic updates and proper form validations.

tasks.title: Responsive Design & Accessibility
tasks.description: Incorporate responsive CSS media queries and semantic HTML to ensure accessibility and mobile compatibility.

tasks.title: Code Review and Quality Assurance
tasks.description: Review all code for adherence to best practices, clean structure, and appropriate comments. Validate responsiveness and accessibility.

rules.codingStandards: Follow industry best practices for HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Ensure the code is modular, well-commented, and maintainable.
rules.versionControl: All changes must be committed to Git with clear commit messages referencing the task IDs.
rules.reviewProcess: Completed tasks must be reviewed by at least one other developer before moving to production.
